description:
The main character, Daiki Hamanaka, has suffered a trauma and is trying to lead a normal life by suppressing his emotions.

Wakaba Misaki, who is always concerned about Daiki, misunderstands her feelings and gradually realizes the difference between them.

The story is about two such people.>
